sentence.Network_en: One step further and you'll be laid out.

sentence.Network_en: Of course, it's a case of so far, so good, but it's only one step.
sentence.Network_cn: 当然，目前情况还算不错，但这也只是一步而已。

sentence.Network_en: Successful travel is partly a matter of keeping one step ahead of the crowd.
sentence.Network_cn: 成功的旅行在某种程度上就是要比人群先走一步。
